definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
thermodynamic temperature scale (in degrees Kelvin, measured above absolute zero)

sentences.english: In some countries air temperature is given in degrees of Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 在某些全國氣溫以華氏溫標給出。

sentences.english: And then you would get the Kelvin scale.
So, let's talk about that briefly today first.
You can also select Fahrenheit or Celsius.
sentences.chinese: 您可以選擇華氏溫標或攝氏溫標。

sentences.english: You can also select Fahrenheit or Celsius.
sentences.chinese: 您可以選擇華氏溫標或攝氏溫標。

sentences.english: The Fahrenheit scale is an interesting scale.
sentences.chinese: 華氏溫標是種有趣的溫標。

sentences.english: The Fahrenheit scale is an interesting scale.
sentences.chinese: 華氏溫標是種有趣的溫標。

sentences.english: Numerical values on any temperature scale are arbitrary.
sentences.chinese: 任一溫標上的數字表達值都是人爲的。

sentences.english: Now you need to define the temperature scales.
The geothermometer is one of the most important methods for reconstructing the thermal history of sedimentary basins.
sentences.chinese: 古溫標是恢復沉積盆地熱演化歷史的重要指標之一。

sentences.english: According to it thermodynamic temperature scale can be realized.
sentences.chinese: 根據它可以用理想氣體實現熱力學溫標。

sentences.english: About 10 orders of magnitude have also been gained on the temperature scale.
sentences.chinese: 約十個數量級的溫標被用來量度。

sentences.english: An absolute temperature scale in fahrenheit degrees.
sentences.chinese: 用華氏度數表示的絕對溫標。

sentences.english: In addition, the limitations of paleotemperature scale for reconstructing the thermal history are specially emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 此外，特別強調了古溫標熱史恢復的侷限性。
